content:
During a night rocket attack, a mobile fire group of land troops with a machine gun with a Browning M2 machine gun destroyed the winged rocket of the enemy rocket.

About thisreportedAnd the relevant video was published by the commander of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavlyuk.

He also stressed that this unit is not the first knocked out winged rocket.

"Training + coordination = result," said Alexander Pavlyuk.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the night of March 21st opponentattackedMore than 30 units have been shot down by ballistic and winged missiles.
title: The Armed Forces of the Armed Forces showed how our machine gun soldiers knocked down the winged rocket
description: This was reported and published by the appropriate video commander of the Armed Forces Land Forces ...
author: Army Inform
